item.description:
"Sideways" Revisited: Pinot Noir vs. Merlot

Ever since the movie "Sideways" came out, wine lovers have been debating the relative merits of these two red wines. Presumably the members of this group have some slight knowledge of the difference, but it's okay if you don't -- let's find out together! Bring a bottle of either Merlot or Pinot Noir, priced under $20 and your own tasting glass. We'll taste them against each other, with a variety of cheeses, bread, and fruit, and share our impressions.

Note: this event will take place outdoors in the yard of a private home. Address and directions will be sent to those who R.S.V.P. "yes." The weather forecast is for a warm and sunny day with no rain; if it changes, we will postpone until the following Sunday.

If we don't have 5 yes R.S.V.Ps by Sunday afternoon at 3, this event will be rescheduled.
item.how_to_find_us: Private home in Medford -- directions will be sent to participants
item.name: Sunday Evening Do-It-Yourself Wine Tasting
